VJP Castellanos > About

Biography

I have a BA degree from Yale University. After graduating from Yale in 2020, I taught English at the Chinese University of Hong Kong as a Yale-China Fellow. From 2022 till 2024, I was an associate at the D. E. Shaw group, a global investment and technology development firm. As of August 2025, I'm a Masters student studying General Psychoteraphy at the Center of Postgraduate Stucdies of the Mexican Psychoanalytic Association.

Writing

I translate literary, psychoanalytic, philosophical, and religious texts to and from Spanish, English, French, and Catalan. Please refer to my translations page for information about my work.
